title: 3rd year cgpa and placements
content: How are u graded in the 3rd year(Btech CSE)? As in how much weightage does capstone hold and how is the remaining weightage or credits allocated? And what semesters are considered for cgpa cutoffs during placements, is it the first 4 or first 6 counting the 3rd year? or is it a projected cgpa?

comments.body:
Your capstone project carries a very minimal weightage of 2 credits in the 6th semester, most of the people end with S or A with decent work done. 

Placements, take your CGPA upto third year after any revaluation/correction. Make sure to fill in the right CGPA every-time a company comes because if it doesn’t match with college records, then they’ll not let you write that exam.
